'Lambert') is a fictional character in the British ITV soap opera [[Emmerdale]].
She is played by Charlie Hardwick. She first appeared on the show on 1 February
2004. In December 2011, it was announced Hardwick would be taking a three-month
break from Emmerdale to appear in a play, and the character left on 10 February
2012. Val returned in June 2012, but is surprised to see that husband Eric has
moved on and is in a relationship with Brenda Walker. She moves into her
sister's pub, after her marriage breakdown helping run it since Diane is away
visiting her daughter.
